body:
Race to Victory II

Work-in-Progress Map Pool


Coral Reef II
Made by: GoldenOre / ogel
/setnext CoralReefII

Forestry
Made by: Fouled
/setnext Forestry

Hedge
Made by: Fouled
/setnext Hedge

Rendezvous CTW
Made by: ParaPenguin & ViceWatercolour
/setnext RendezvousCTW

Sea Port
Made by: Fouled
/setnext Seaport

Sub Urban
Made by: Fouled
/setnext Suburban


This map pool is a work-in-progress, and is currently posted in order to allow players to view the maps on scrimmage servers. The pool is subject to change, and is not finalized. Any bugs or issues found with the maps in the pool, should be reported within replies to this thread.

replies.body: Rend CTW is by far the best ctw map on this server and I see no reason to not include it. The second and 3rd, Wahiz and Senex have problems. Rend's only problem is its size and yet its still better than most of these maps. Not saying all of these maps will play poorly, I'm sure some will do great, but please include the best map from the last CTW tourney that we all know works.
replies.body_tagged: Rend CTW is by far the best ctw map on this server and I see no reason to not include it. The second and 3rd, Wahiz and Senex have problems. Rend's only problem is its size and yet its still better than most of these maps. Not saying all of these maps will play poorly, I'm sure some will do great, but please include the best map from the last CTW tourney that we all know works.

replies.body: I'm not saying coral is bad, deepwing is better because you can do either skybridge to conter ground pushes or ground pushes to control the map, variety in gameplay is key, coral wool rooms are very good but the map gets super spammy and in late game super difficult to play.

replies.body: General consensus of Coral Reef II from when it was in an OCN tourney was that it didnt play well. Idk why you're choosing it over so many other good maps

replies.body:
Coral is bad tho, like really bad.

Islands are way too close to each other. Since the islands are so close to each other, you can't hold mid at all since the other team can make massive bridges across in no time. Its just a painloop war to mid.

Theres a lot of other stuff wrong with that map but thats the main one.

replies.body:
lgmatias   Streamer   Tournament Runner Up
 June 25, 2017 at 12:37 PM  0 replies  Reply
Rend CTW is by far the best ctw map on this server and I see no reason to not include it. The second and 3rd, Wahiz and Senex have problems. Rend's only problem is its size and yet its still better than most of these maps. Not saying all of these maps will play poorly, I'm sure some will do great, but please include the best map from the last CTW tourney that we all know works.

yes i do agree though the play the same meta for skybridge but outta all the maps that have this sky meta, rend is the best and we need one map with this meta on the map pool - which should be rend. thats my point
